\section{Generation of MATH: Algebra}
\label{sec:generation-MATH-Algebra}

\begin{longtable}{|l|p{8cm}|p{8cm}|}
\caption{New questions generated from MATH Algebra questions, and the closest question among the existing questions.}\\
\hline
\textbf{ID} & \textbf{Auto-Generated question} & \textbf{Closest question in the dataset}\\
\hline
1 & If $f(x)   \dfrac{x^2-1}{x^2+1}$, what is $f(f(x))$? & 
If $f(x)\dfrac{5x+1}{x-1}$, find the value of $f(7)$.
\\
\hline
2 & If $f(x)   \dfrac{x^2-1}{x^2+1}$, find $f(1)$.& 
If $f(x)\dfrac{5x+1}{x-1}$, find the value of $f(7)$.
\\
\hline
3 & If $f(1)7$, $f(2)12$ and $f(x)ax+bx+2$, what is the value of $f(3)$? &
If $f(1)5$, $f(2)8$ and $f(x)ax+bx+2$, what is the value of $f(3)$?
\\
\hline
4 & Find the distance between the points $(3,4)$ and $(0,0)$.& 
Find the distance between the points $(0,4)$ and $(3,0)$.
\\ 
\hline
5 & A rectangle with a perimeter of $24$ has a diagonal of length $8$. What is the area of the rectangle?& 
The sum of two numbers is $12$ and their difference is $20$. What is the smaller number?
\\
\hline
6 & The graph of $yf(x)$ is a straight line that passes through the points $(1,1)$ and $(2,2)$. What is the value of $f(2)$?&
What is the $x$-intercept of the line perpendicular to the line defined by $3x-2y   6$ and whose $y$-intercept is 2?
\\
\hline
7 & If $f(x)   \dfrac{x^2-x}{x^2+x}$, what is $f(2)$?& 
If $f(x)\dfrac{5x+1}{x-1}$, find the value of $f(7)$.
\\
\hline
8 & If $f(x)   \frac{x^2 - 1}{x^2 + 1}$, what is $f(-1)$? & 
If $f(x)\dfrac{5x+1}{x-1}$, find the value of $f(7)$.
\\
\hline
9 & Find the sum of the first $10$ terms of the geometric progression whose first term is $1$ and whose ratio is $2$. & 
What is the sum of the even, positive integers less than 62?
\\
\hline
10 & Find the distance between the points $(0,0)$ and $(3,4)$. & 
Find the distance between the points $(0,4)$ and $(3,0)$.
\\
\hline
\end{longtable}
title: A Neural Network Solves, Explains, and Generates University Math Problems by Program Synthesis and Few-Shot Learning at Human Level
